Memory Game

A simple browser game that tests your ability to recall matching patterns. Built as an introduction to MVC and MERN stack.

Knowledge Base

A "facebook-like" website to connect lovers of web development. Result of a 6-week project, aimed at learning MVC.

Abalone

Agent designed to win Abalone, a game about pushing marbles. Created as part of an Introduction to AI course, over the course of 8 weeks. Project is divided into React UI and Java backend.

   UI Github    Server Github

Aircraft Image Classification

A project created with the help of Spexi Geospatial as an exploration of the application of machine learning to aircraft defect recognition.
